_header: By frailness of thy flesh thou fell in a case
_description: Our Lady mediates — two couplets translating Case cecidisti carne cecata…

CULGg616.Transcription:
By ffrelnes off þi fflesche þu ffell in a caasþu
                    gaffiste to the dule þat to the goffyn wasYt aperythe in thi honde
                    wrytun With InThat thoro þe prayer off owre lady ffor ȝovyn is
                    þi syn
CULGg616.Note:
Trans. ‘Case cecidisti carne cecata…’ which
                    precedes it; ‘owre lady’ in line 4 glossed ‘only mediator
                    Ihesu criste’.
